findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `CBT` token contract, there is a privileged `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.

findings.title: Improved Sanity Checks For System Parameters
findings.description: The update logic of `setTransferFee()` can be improved by applying more rigorous sanity checks to avoid undesirable consequences such as unreasonably high fee charges to users.
